required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fatty Liver Response of Cardio-metabolic Risk Factors to Laser Acupuncture Versus Cupping
clinical_study.official_title: Non-alcoholic Fatty Liver Response of Cardio-metabolic Risk Factors to Laser Acupuncture Versus Cupping-with-scarification

brief_summary.textblock: Every-two-week applied cupping (with scarification) session within one month on back of upper thorax is not compared previously regarding its effect on cardio-metabolic risk factors to the daily application of laser on acupoints (for month, except Fridays) in fatty liver patients. This trial will compare the two procedure effects on cardio-metabolic risk factors in fatty liver.

detailed_description.textblock: In fatty liver patients,every-two-week applied cupping (with scarification) session within one month on back of upper thorax for 30 patients will be compared regarding its effect on cardio-metabolic risk factors to the daily application of laser on acupoints (for month, except Fridays) of other 30 patients.

primary_outcome.time_frame: It will be measured after 4 weeks of treatment
It will be measured after 4 weeks of treatment
It will be measured after 4 weeks of treatment
It will be measured after 4 weeks of treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: It will be measured after 4 weeks of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: it will be measured in plasma

It will be measured after 4 weeks of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: it will be measure with manual manometer

secondary_outcome.time_frame: It will be measured after 4 weeks of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: it will be measured at radial artery

arm_group.description: In fatty liver patients (30 patients), a daily application of 4-minute laser (for one month, except Fridays) on acupoint number 25,40,36 of stomach meridian, acupoint number 3 of liver meridian, acupoint number 6 of spleen meridian,acupoint number 9.12,4 of conception vessel meridian, acupoint number 14 of governor vessel meridian, acupoint number 4, 11 of large intestine meridian, acupoint number 34 of gall bladder meridian
In fatty liver patients (30 patients),every-two-week applied cupping (with scarification) session within one month on back of upper thorax

intervention.description: In fatty liver patients (30 patients), a daily application of 4-minute laser (for one month, except Fridays) on acupoint number 25,40,36 of stomach meridian, acupoint number 3 of liver meridian, acupoint number 6 of spleen meridian,acupoint number 9,12,4 of conception vessel meridian, acupoint number 14 of governor vessel meridian, acupoint number 4, 11 of large intestine meridian, acupoint number 34 of gall bladder meridian
In fatty liver patients (30 patients),every-two-week applied cupping (with scarification) session within one month on back of upper thorax

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosed Fatty liver patients by ultrasonography
- Class I obese patients
Exclusion Criteria:
- Cardiovascular and respiratory disorders/diseases.
- Autoimmune disorders/diseases.
- Pregnancy
- Other liver disorders/diseases.

facility.name: Faculty of Physical Therapy Cairo University

responsible_party.investigator_title: lecturer of Physical Therapy for Cardiovascular / Respiratory Disorder and Geriatrics, Faculty of Physical Therapy, Cairo University
